page.title: 03Pendlebury Landscape
page.content: A lot of the houses in{Pendlebury have been built in the last fifty years. There are not many old houses because they have been knocked down and new ones built. The old houses were lived in by people who worked at {Pendlebury Colliery}or the{Acme mill,} when Pendlebury was a town by itself. The colliery and the mill have both been knocked down and Pendlebury is part of{Salford}now.About half of the houses are council owned and half are private. Most are quite small with two or three bedrooms. There used to be a huge house nearby called{Agecroft Hall but it was taken down and sent to {America}for somebody to live in. Now there are no big houses here. A lot of small factories have been built in Pendlebury, making things like {computers}and{stainless steel} products.
